job_history.work_description: Maintained accounts receivable documentation electronically and on paper. Processed bank reconciliations and financial reports to verify practice of p weekly and monthly. Increased efficiency and alleviated work loads by creating a new Excel financial recording system. Collaborated extensively with auditors during preliminary and year-end audit processes. Entered weekly sales and customer count sheets for review by management. Processed payroll, electronic deposits and employee pay adjustments.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Processed bank reconciliations and financial reports to verify practice on a weekly and monthly basis, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Processed payroll, electronic deposits, and employee pay adjustments, indicating strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Created a new Excel financial recording system to increase efficiency, suggesting strong proficiency in using Excel for financial management.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Processed financial reports to verify practice on a weekly and monthly basis, showing a solid working proficiency in financial reporting.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Collaborated extensively with auditors during preliminary and year-end audit processes, indicating some practical experience in auditing.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Maintained accounts receivable documentation electronically and on paper, and entered weekly sales and customer count sheets for review by management, suggesting strong proficiency in accounting.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: No direct leadership experience mentioned, but collaborated with auditors, indicating basic familiarity with leadership skills.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Entered weekly sales and customer count sheets for review by management, indicating some practical experience in data analysis.
